block.p: Films and videos that are part of the 1991 Biennial Exhibition will continue to be screened through June 16 at the Whitney Museum of American Art, Madison Avenue and 75th Street. Admission to screenings is included in museum entrance fee of $5 ($3 for the elderly and students). Information: (212) 570-3611. Here is a schedule. Today "NEW YORK PORTRAIT: PART III" (1990); "SISKYAVI: THE PLACE OF CHASMS" (1989); "FADE TO BLACK" (1990). 2 P.M. Tomorrow-Sunday

Films and videos that are part of the 1991 Biennial Exhibition will continue to be screened through June 16 at the Whitney Museum of American Art, Madison Avenue and 75th Street. Admission to screenings is included in museum entrance fee of $5 ($3 for the elderly and students). Information: (212) 570-3611. Here is a schedule. Today "NEW YORK PORTRAIT: PART III" (1990); "SISKYAVI: THE PLACE OF CHASMS" (1989); "FADE TO BLACK" (1990). 2 P.M. Tomorrow-Sunday
"SUR DEL SUR" (1990); "BELLADONNA" (1989); "MEMORIES FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF AMNESIA" (1989); "SINK OR SWIM" (1990). 2 P.M. Tuesday-Wednesday
"PARIS IS BURNING" (1990); "VIDEO IS TELEVISION?" (1989); "THEY ARE LOST TO VISION ALTOGETHER" (1989). Tuesday, 6:15 P.M.; Wednesday, 2 P.M. April 25-26
"THE LONG WEEKEND (O'DESPAIR)" (1989). 2 P.M. April 27-28
"THE MACHINE THAT KILLED BAD PEOPLE" (1990). 2 P.M. April 30-May 1
"THE MAN IN THE MIRROR" (1990); "HISTORY AND MEMORY" (1991). April 30, 6:15 P.M.; May 1, 2 P.M. May 2-3
"HARD TIMES AND CULTURE, PART I" (1990); "STRATEGIES FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF/REDEFINING THE PURPOSE SERVED, ART IN THE AGE OF . . . a.k.a. THE MAKING OF THE TOWERING INFERNO" (1989). 2 P.M. May 4-5
"A SPY IN THE HOUSE THAT RUTH BUILT" (1989); "BLIND COUNTRY" (1989). 2 P.M. May 7-8
"THE DEADMAN" (1989); "BECAUSE WE MUST" (1989). May 7, 6:15 P.M.; May 8, 2 P.M. May 9-10
"CYCLES" (1989); "TONGUES UNTIED" (1989). 2 P.M. May 11-12
"FRIENDLY WITNESS" (1989); "SITE/ RECITE (A PROLOGUE) (1989); "VOLCANO SAGA" (1989); "FROM HERE AND THERE TOO: MOSCOW POSTCARDS 1989" (1990). 2 P.M. May 14-15
"NEW YORK PORTRAIT: PART III" (1990); "SISKYAVI: THE PLACE OF CHASMS" (1989); "FADE TO BLACK" (1990). May 14, 6:15 P.M.; May 15, 2 P.M. May 16-17
"SUR DEL SUR" (1990); "BELLADONNA" (1989); "MEMORIES FROM THE DEPARTMENT OF AMNESIA" (1989); "SINK OR SWIM" (1990). 2 P.M. May 18-19
"PARIS IS BURNING" (1990); "VIDEO IS TELEVISION?" (1989); "THEY ARE LOST TO VISION ALTOGETHER" (1989). 2 P.M. May 21-22
"THE LONG WEEKEND (O'DESPAIR) (1989). 2 P.M. May 23-26
"PRIVILEGE" (1990). 2 P.M. May 30-June 2
"TALES OF THE FORGOTTEN FUTURE, PART 2, FIVE O'CLOCK WORLDS" (1990); "TALES OF THE FORGOTTEN FUTURE, PART 3, MOOD OPULENCE" (1990-91). 2 P.M. June 7-9 and 11
"BOOK OF DAYS" (1989). June 7, 8, 9 at 2 P.M.; June 11, 6:15 P.M. June 13-16
"WATER AND POWER" (1989). 2 P.M.
